Shadow742000:

no errores

Dude I’m sure we’ve been over this before. This isn’t your first topic about your server not supporting colors. Go look in the client section on this. They have tutorials to make your client support colors, and in terms, your server.

item.title: Help please! problems changing text color REP++
item.dc:creator: @Shadow742000 Shadow742000
item.description:
@Shadow742000 wrote:

[quote=“zzjimmy, post:6, topic:440965”]Do you want the clan name to be in a different colour or, the person that is sending the message?

Edit: I see what you’re trying to do
Try this:

person.sM("[@blu@"+clanName +"] @bla@"+playerName+": "+msg);
or

person.sM("@blu@["+ clanName +"]@bla@ "+playerName+": "+msg); [/quote]
doesnt work.

Read full topic
